product_name: Dragon NFXs Nozaka DAP Snow Goggles
long_description: These snow goggles deliver comfort, optical performance and style on the slopes, with a rimless design and an oversize interchangeable lens to enhance peripheral vision in any light conditions.
short_description: These snow goggles deliver comfort, optical performance and style on the slopes, with a rimless design and an oversize interchangeable lens to enhance peripheral vision in any light conditions.
